DOC.brief_summary: Whole body vibration ( WBV ) acutely improve quadriceps strength , may improve long-term outcome individual anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction ( ACLR ) . However , unclear WBV influence athletic task run . The purpose study evaluate influence WBV run biomechanics individual ACLR .
DOC.detailed_description: Individuals anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction ( ACLR ) deficits quadriceps muscle function influence walk run biomechanics . In long term , alteration walk run contribute physical disability development knee osteoarthritis . Unfortunately , rehabilitation quadriceps muscle often ineffective , novel strategy improve rehabilitation effort need . Whole body vibration ( WBV ) acutely improve quadriceps strength , may improve long-term outcome individual ACLR . However , unclear WBV influence athletic task run . Specific Aim 1 : The purpose study determine effect WBV run biomechanics individual ACLR . The investigator hypothesize WBV improve run characteristic associate knee osteoarthritis development .
DOC.criteria: 1835 year Unilateral ACL reconstruction At least 6 month postreconstruction Recreationally active ( least 20 minute physical activity 3 time per week ) History ACL graft rupture revision surgery Neurological disorder Other low extremity within 6 month prior participation
